user.title: Evaka Daycare Calendar
user.description:
Connect to your Evaka daycare calendar using your weak login credentials.

**Note:** You must have 'Email login' enabled in your Evaka profile settings.

error.invalid_auth: Invalid username or password, or weak login is not enabled for your account.
error.cannot_connect: Cannot connect to Evaka. Please check your internet connection.

abort.already_configured: This Evaka account is already configured
